test.name: SecretMMS.TC.009
test.description:
Validate Sending a secret MMS to multiple Recipients fails [MMS Subject/Content is in Russian] / Recipients are distributed across To, Cc, Bcc Headers Test Category: MUST Test Steps: --------------------------------------------------------------- Scenario #1: 1. Login to the MMS Extra Management portal. 2. Sender send a Secret MMS with the subject in Russian and intercepted message has been forwarded through MMS Proxy via MM1. 3. Select the To, CC and Bcc and add multiple recipients to these headers. 4. Application sends the discard message to MMS proxy 5. Sender should get the SMS confirmation for failed MMS delivery
Scenario #2: 1. Login to the MMS Extra Management portal. 2. Send a Secret MMS with the content in Russian. 3. Select the To, CC and Bcc and add multiple recipients to these headers from the database. 4. Application sends the discard message to MMS proxy 5. Sender should get the SMS confirmation for failed MMS delivery ---------------------------------------------------------------

function.name: setHeader
function.parameter: #Secret MMS to multiple recipients Secret TC.009

function.name: checkHeader
function.parameter: MMSX: Secret message rejected because you can only send a secret message to a single target recipient.
